title: Skyjacked (1972 - USA) [Charlton Heston] disaster action
description:
Skyjacked (1972 - USA)

Action / Adventure / Drama

starring . . . . Charlton Heston. James Brolin, Yvette Mimieux
                   Susan Dey, Mariette Hartley, Walter Pidgeon
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0069278/


During a routine flight to Minneapolis, a passenger aboard Global Airways Flight 502, a Boeing 707, discovers a bomb threat written on the mirror of one of the first-class bathrooms. A second threat is soon found left on a napkin in a galley. Captain Hank O'Hara takes the cryptic threats seriously and follows the instructions - "Bomb on plane divert to Anchorage Alaska. No Joke, No Tricks. Death" - by changing course for Alaska. To avoid an explosive decompression if a bomb goes off, he flies at lower altitude, increasing fuel consumption.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x308, 23.976 fps, 1800 Kbps, 01h41m06s
Audio: AAC, 48000 Hz, stereo

DVDRip, English audio, optional subtitles English and French
